text: U.S. Route 70 or U.S. Highway 70 (US 70) is an eastâ€“west United States highway that goes from US 60 / Arizona State Route 77 in Globe, Arizona to Seashore Drive in Atlantic, North Carolina. The highway is long. The highway's western end used to be in Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:U.S. Highways
title: U.S. Route 70
